name: ACNHturnipcalculator
0:
”Alexa, open turnip calculator”
”Alexa, ask turnip calculator to add a price”
”Alexa, ask turnip calculator to add the buy price”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: turnip calculator
des:
The turnip calculator predicts the best selling price during the week. The prediction is based on the daily price information provided to the skill. The prediction is not a guarantee, it's only an approximation.

The prediction algorithm was taken from: https://gitlab.com/nanoNago/turnips which in turn is based on: https://gist.github.com/Treeki/85be14d297c80c8b3c0a76375743325b
